import * as Form from '@radix-ui/react-form'; import { useRef } from 'react'; function Login() { const password = useRef(); const email = useRef(); const b = { password: password.current.valure, email: email.current.value } const submitHandler = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); await fetch("http://localhost:4000/login", { method: 'POST', headers: { Accept: 'application.json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify(b), }).then((res) => res.json()).then((data) => console.log(data)); } return (
